== Description ==

This plugin allows the user to select a particular Transaction controller to be navigated when an error occurs in other words allows the user journey to be altered when an error occurs. This plugin is called as <b>Error Handling Thread Group</b>

[/img/wiki/esl_Error_Handling_Thread_Group01.png]

[/img/wiki/esl_Error_Handling_Thread_Group02.png]

[/img/wiki/esl_Error_Handling_Thread_Group03.png]


On selecting the “Go To Controller” option in the action to be taken after a sampler error, the Go To controller dropdown in error handling thread properties gets enabled.  The dropdown has options to select the transaction controllers added under the thread group.

In the attached screenshot, Thread group has multiple transaction controllers Launch, Login, click_view(1..5), During load test execution when an error occurs in any of the steps like click_view1 and if the user has to navigate to logout, we can add toggle GoTo controller and select logout transaction controller in the error handling thread properties.

[/img/wiki/esl_Error_Handling_Thread_Group04.png]

On Execution an error occurred in ClearSession, instead of executing click-view-3,  click-view-4 & click-view-5, it had executed logout
